section.name: Contributions
section.p:
EJBCA is an open source project and appreciates community contributions:
Contribute code, joint the EJBCA Team!
We are generous with CVS access once you have proven yourself with a few patches and have longer-term intentions.
Contribute documentation. Documentation can always be improved.
See contact & support for ways to contact EJBCA.

section.name: Donations
section.p:
You can donate to EJBCA in a number of ways:
Through Donations.
By hiring someone for integration or sponsoring development of features. Contact the project admins at contact & support.
By hiring us for support. Contact the project admins at contact & support.
